snippet: For the luxury consumer who is excited to hear about what’s going on in a range of categories, the first issue of Du Jour, a new print-digital hybrid, will be released this month.
abstract: First issue of Du Jour, a new print-digital hybrid fashion magazine, will be released this month only to wealthy people who have met at least five of seven criteria, including an which includes an average net worth of $5 million and a house worth at least $1.5 million.
lead_paragraph: For the luxury consumer who is excited to hear about what’s going on in a range of categories, the first issue of Du Jour, a new print-digital hybrid, will be released this month.

headline.print_headline: Us Weekly, For a Lot Fewer of Us
headline.seo: Du Jour, a New Magazine for the Wealthy
headline.main: Us Weekly, for a Lot Fewer of Us
